resources.string: Send system notification when unexpected weather such as extreme rain, snow and temperature change happens.
Have opened %s weather notification, system notification will be sent when unexpected weather such as rain, snow and temperature change happens.
Send today\'s weather data to your friends and family via SMS.
No network connection, please check network
Network instable. Please try again later
no city that you want to query
Locating failed. Please select city manually in menu list.
No weather data, click to refresh
#MIUI weather#\nToday %1$s\'s air quality index is %2$s, %3$s. %4$s %5$s published.
Play animation in the main interface
Confirm to delete the selected %d city?
When going outdoors, please wear appropriate clothing.
%1$s temperature today is estimated to be %2$s
In order to detect your position, you will need to enable wireless network locating function. Agreeing will bring you to the location services interface. Please open Network Based Location Services.
All the people may free activities in the outdoor.
Unusually sensitive people should consider reducing prolonged or heavy exertion.
People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.
People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should avoid prolonged or heavy exertion; everyone else should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.
People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should avoid all physical activity outdoors. Everyone else should avoid prolonged or heavy exertion.
Everyone should avoid all physical activity outdoors; people with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should remain indoors and keep activity levels low.

array.name: weather_image_tips
array.item: It\'s raining heavily, so remember to bring an umbrella and if you have, wear rainboots too.
It\'s raining heavily, so remember to bring an umbrella and if you have, wear rainboots too.
It\'s raining heavily, so remember to bring an umbrella and if you have, wear rainboots too.
If you are coming out, remember to bring an umbrella!
If you are coming out, remember to bring an umbrella!
The weather forecasts heavy rains; remember to bring an umbrella and not catch a cold.
It\'s going to rain today, remember to bring an umbrella!
It\'s drizzling outside, recommend to bring an umbrella!
It\'s rainy and snowy outside, recommend to bring an umbrella! It\'s also cold out, so make sure you wear proper clothing.
It\'s snowing heavily, remember to wear a hat and scarf!
It\'s forcasted to snow today, remember to bring a hat and scarf.
It\'s snowing a lot, remember to wear a hat and scarf!
It\'s snowing quite a bit, remember to wear a hat and scarf!
There is a light snowfall, so remember to wear a hat and scarf.
There is a very strong sandstorm. Recommend to wear a hat and mask.
It\'s raining quite a bit, remember to bring an umbrella.
There is a sandstorm, it is recommended to bring a hat and mask.
There is a sandstorm, it is recommended to bring a hat and mask.
It\'s not everyday you see hail, remember to walk carefully!

It will be cloudy but it won\'t rain today.
The weather will get worse, it is not recommended to stay indoors for a while.
When going outside, please pay attention to the traffic. If driving, please drive safetly :)
It\'s raining heavily, remember to bring an umbrella, and if you have, wear rainboots too.
It\'s raining heavily, remember to bring an umbrella, and if you have, wear rainboots too.

When going out, be mindful of the rain and bring an umbrella!
It\'s raining heavily, remember to bring an umbrella and not catch a cold^^
It\'s raining quite a bit, remember to bring an umbrella!
It\'s drizzling outside, recommend to bring an umbrella!
It\'s a snowy-rainy day, it is recommended to bring an umbrealla! Also remember to wear proper clothing.
It\'s snowing heavily, remember to wear a hat and scarf!
It will snow today, so remember to bring a hat and scarf.
It\'s snowing heavily, remember to wear a hat and scarf!
It\'s snowing quite a bit, remember to wear a hat and scarf!
It\'s snowing, remember to wear a hat and scarf!
The sandstorm is very strong, it is recommeded to wear a hat and mask.
The sandstorm is strong, it is recommended to wear a hat and mask.
There is a sandstorm, it is recommended to bring a hat and mask.
There is a sandstorm, it is recommended to bring a hat and mask.
It\'s not everyday you see hail, remember to walk carefully!
There is a floating dust, it is recommended to bring a hat and mask.
There is a haze, it is not recommended to stay indoors for a while.

array.name: weather_info_uv
array.item: UV index update is temporarily unavaliable, please check back later.
The UV index indicates moderate intensity. It is recommended to put on sunscreen, hat and sunglasses when outdoors.
The UV index indicates weak intensity, so no extra protection is required. If you are outdoors for a long time, it is recommended to put on sunscreen with SPF 8-12.
The UV index indicates medium intensity, it is recommended to put on SPF of 12 - 15 sunblock and PA+ skin care product.
The UV index indicates strong intensity, it is recommended to put on SPF 20 sunblock and PA++ skin care product. Avoid the sun between 10:00 to 14:00.
The UV index indicates very strong intensity, it is recommended to put on SPF 20+ sunblock and PA++ skin care product. Avoid the sun if possible.

array.name: weather_info_dress
array.item: Clothing index update is temporarily unavaliable, please check back later.
It is recommended to wear a light jacket.
It is recommended to wear a light jacket.
It is hot out, recommend to wear summer clothing.
It is pretty hot out and recommend to wear summer apparel.
It is warm out and recommended to wear spring or autumn apparel.
The weather is getting cooler, recommend to wear spring or autumn apparel.
The weather is getting quite cool now, it is recommended to wear warmer apparel such as a thicker jacket for Spring or Autumn.
The weather is cold, it is recommended to wear appropriate winter apparel.
The weather is freezing, it is recommended to wear appropriate winter apparel.

array.name: weather_info_msport
array.item: Morning excercise index update is temporarily unavaliable, please check back later.
With sunny skies and fresh air, it is great time to go do your morning excercise. Appropriate weather for all age.
Morning weather is good for moring excerise. Recommend to wear warmer clothing and be in more sheltered areas during windy periods to prevent catching a cold.
There will be drastic weather change this morning, so it is recommended to not excercise or shorten excercise time. Wear appropriate gear.
The weather is bad this morning so it is recommended to do your exercise indoors.

array.name: weather_info_comfort
array.item: Comfort index update is temporarily unavaliable, please check back later.
Temperatures are stable and quite comfortable
Today\'s weather is not too hot or cold nor too windy. It should be relatively cool and comfortable.
The range in temperature today may cause les comfortable weather conditions.
Clear skies but the temperature is not ideal. You may feel uncomfortable.
It is cloudy out with hot tempuratures and high humidity, you will feel very hot and uncomfortable.

array.name: weather_info_wcar
array.item: Car wash index update is temporarily unavaliable, please check back later.
Weather conditions are suitable for car wash today - good outdoor weather for a car wash and no rain is predicted for the next to days
Weather conditions are good for a car wash today - good outdoor weather for a car wash and no rain is predicted for the next day.
If you don\'t need to wash the car, than don\'t. There will be scattered showers in the next 12 hours. If car is washed be prepared for it to get a bit dirty from puddles and mud on the road.
Weather is not suitable for a car wash today. It will rain in the next 24 hours and the mud on the road will get the car dirty again.
Weather is not suitable for a car wash today. There will be a sandstorm in the next 24 hours and the sand will get the car dusty.
Weather is not suitable for a car wash today. It will snow in the next 24 hours and the slush on the road will get the car dirty.
Weather is not suitable for a car wash today. Weather will change for the worse in the next 24 hours so your car may get dirty from the road conditions.

array.name: weather_info_hung
array.item: Drying index update is temporarily unavaliable, please check back later.
Sunny weather but the temperatures are cool. However, the sun will warm in the afternoon and allow for your clothes to dry quickly.
Clear skies and adequate sunlight allows for clothes to dry quickly.
Cloudy but with the hot temperatures, clothes will still dry.
The weather is good and suitable for drying clothes.
Patches of rain may get your clothes wet. If your drying your clothes, pay attention to the weather changes.
Clear skies and adequate sunlight allow for good drying conditions.
Clothes should not be dried outside due to the rain. Recommended to dry your clothes indoors.
Clothes should not be dried outside due to the rain. Recommended to dry your clothes indoors.

array.name: weather_info_travel
array.item: Leisure index update is temporarily unavaliable, please check back later.
Clear and sunny weather with good temperatures. Weather is recommended for leisure and outdoor activities.
Mild and stable temperatures makes for favorable leisure and outdoor activity conditions.
Mild and stable temperatures makes for favorable leisure and outdoor activity conditions.
The weather will change quite a bit today and it is recommended to stay indoors.
There will be drastic weather change and it is recommended to stay indoors.
Clear skies, mild temperatures with a bit of wind. Be aware of the windy periods while enjoy your leisure and outdoor activities.

array.name: weather_info_fl
array.item: It\'s windy today so please wear appropriate apparel.
微风
Breezy weather outside, recommended to go outdoors and relax for a bit.
暂缺
Wind index is temporarily unavaliable, please check back later.
